label: A3B5_tI32_140_ah_cl-001
title: Cr$_{5}$B$_{3}$ ($D8_{l}$) Structure
comments: We have been unable to obtain a copy of (Bertaut, 1953), so we use the data found online from (Downs, 2003). Although Cr$_{5}$B$_{3}$ is universally regarded as the prototype for $D8_{l}$, it appears that no other determination of the internal parameters has ever been made. The values found in (Downs, 2003) seem to be reasonable choices, and agree with the ICSD entry.
